course.course_group: East Asian Film and Media Studies
course.title: Chinese Cinema
course.meeting_text: M., 1–2:30, and an additional section to be arranged. Film screenings Wednesday, 7-9 pm
course.description: Introduction to major works, genres, and waves of Chinese cinema from the silent era to the present (with a focus on Mainland China). We will discuss formal aesthetics, historical representation, and audience reception. Students are encouraged to collaborate on their own short films in response to works we watch in class.
